task_text: Which of my projects doesn't have somebody responsible for the quality assurance on the team?

text_blocks: Now I need to find which projects you are involved in, and then check which ones don't have a QA role on the team.

project.name: Signal mast & infrastructure coating upgrade
project.description: System upgrade for signal masts and exposed rail infrastructure elements.

text_blocks:
I found that you are involved in 1 project. Let me check if this project has a QA role on the team:

Looking at the team for project "Signal mast & infrastructure coating upgrade":
- You (Bhwa_028) - Lead
- Bhwa_042 - Engineer
- Bhwa_086 - Ops

There is no "QA" (Quality Assurance) role on this team.

input.message:
Your project **Signal mast & infrastructure coating upgrade** (for FerroRail) doesn't have anyone responsible for Quality Assurance on the team.

Current team composition:
- **You** - Lead (0.4 FTE)
- An Engineer (0.4 FTE)
- An Ops member (0.2 FTE)

As the Lead of this project, you may want to consider adding someone with a QA role to the team.
